snippet: Hilton Botha, the former lead detective in the investigation into the death of the girlfriend of the Olympic athlete Oscar Pistorius, has resigned, the police said Thursday.
abstract: Hilton Botha, former lead detective in investigation into the death of Reeva Steenkamp, girlfriend of Olympic athlete Oscar Pistorius, resigns amid criticism that he bungled investigation.
lead_paragraph: Hilton Botha, the former lead detective in the investigation into the death of the girlfriend of the Olympic athlete Oscar Pistorius, has resigned, the police said Thursday.

headline.main: South Africa: Detective Who Erred in Pistorius Investigation Resigns
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Detective Who Erred In Pistorius Investigation Resigns
